about_the_game:
In Rules: Politically Incorrect you get to become the President.
Take on ruling a modern democracy with just one finger.



Being in charge is about making people happy.
All of them. All the time.

Balance between Authority, Equality, Progressiveness and your Budget
as long as possible. Become the kind of leader you actually are.
Only God can judge you.





Modern democracy is about a lot of things:
freedom, equality, justice and inclusivity.

But sometimes its also about banning white toilet paper,
legalizing machine guns for kids or creating a revolt in
a neighbor country for oil.



You can’t become all powerful without some aids.
Since you get to come back from the underworld a lot.
You get to play with the Only Ring, Ark of Covenant.



A man is judged by how his endings, not beginnings.
Explore more than 1200 events filled with edgy humor
and in style. Each play through is going to be different
meaning there is a chance you might just finish the game
and break the ancient Indian curse!

Share your insights with us on our Discord channel.

short_description: In this crazy world you are becoming a leader of democracy and your task will be to maintain a balance between development, budget, equality and power. Choose whether you prefer to be seen as a brutal capitalist or a gentle social democrat. Your choices will be written on the pages of history.
